### Check Python Code Highlighting ###

```python
import landslide
class MyMacro(Macro):
   def process(self, content, source=None):
     return content + '<p>plop</p>', ['plopped_slide'] 
 g = generator.Generator(source='toto.md')
g.register_macro(MyMacro)
print g.render()
```
